name: part_002
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】歌に謎解きにホラーあり！？こよりらしさを詰め込んだライブ！ - THE KOYORI - 【 #博衣こより1周年 ⧸ホロライブ】 [aLgQxWOWEnw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Hakui Koyori solving riddles and trials during her 1st anniversary 3D live stream.
The handcuffs come off as Koyori finishes the trials, and she jokes with the staff.

subtitles.original: タカウサギコヨーテじゃ！
subtitles.english: It's Taka-Usagi-Koyote!

subtitles.original: じゃ、じゃ、みんなのほうが早かったか...
subtitles.english: Well, it seems you guys were faster than me...

subtitles.original: こよりもさ、コンコヨかな？とかちょっと思ったんだけど
subtitles.english: I was thinking, maybe it was 'Konkoyo'?

subtitles.original: タカウサギコヨーテってことは、えっと...
subtitles.english: But since it's Taka-Usagi-Koyote, let's see...

subtitles.original: ぺこら先輩のギウサギのギに１文字目がいったから「ギ」！
subtitles.english: The first letter of Pekora-senpai's 'Gi-Usagi' is 'Gi'!

subtitles.original: ルイるいがタカだから「タ」にいったから「タ」！
subtitles.english: Lui-lui is 'Taka' (Hawk), and that was the second, so 'Ta'!

subtitles.original: で、こよりがコヨーテだから３文字目に上がっていったから伸ばし棒！
subtitles.english: And I'm 'Koyote'. Since that was the third part, it's a long vowel mark!

subtitles.original: 「ギターを使え」！どうよ？
subtitles.english: 'Use the guitar'! How about that?

subtitles.original: なんか「オーズを使え」はおかしいやろ。超常現象みたいなの使わなきゃいけないやろ。
subtitles.english: Saying 'Use the OOO' would be weird, wouldn't it? It sounds like some supernatural phenomenon.

subtitles.original: ギター、イェーイ！じゃ、２曲目！２曲目の謎もください！
subtitles.english: Guitar, yay! Okay, the second song! Give me the second riddle!

subtitles.original: これがね、これが解けないと推すんですよ、今日。マジでこれが不安だった。はい、くださいください！
subtitles.english: If I can't solve this, I'll be stuck here today. I was really worried about this. Please, give it to me!

subtitles.original: ２問目どうぞ！なに？えっ？！
subtitles.english: Second question, go! What? Huh?!

subtitles.original:
カリウム＋E＋モリブデン＋窒素＋酸素＝？
ああでも、これはちょっとこよりを何だと思っているのか。
subtitles.english:
Potassium + E + Molybdenum + Nitrogen + Oxygen = ?
Ah, but really, what do they think of me?

subtitles.original: このラボを見てね？繋がってるな！研究者ですからね！
subtitles.english: Look at this lab, okay? It's all connected! I am a researcher, after all!

subtitles.original: これはあれなんじゃないの？あ、待って、なんか後ろに元素表...
subtitles.english: Isn't it that? Oh wait, there's a periodic table in the back...

subtitles.original: 元素表なくても解けるって。周期表か。カリウムは「K」！
subtitles.english: I can solve it even without that. The periodic table, right. Potassium is 'K'!

subtitles.original: カリウムはKだから、K-E...モリブデン何みんな？MB？MO？
subtitles.english: Potassium is K, so K-E... What's Molybdenum, everyone? MB? MO?

subtitles.original: MO！窒素はN、酸素はO。これついてきてますかみんな？
subtitles.english: MO! Nitrogen is N, Oxygen is O. Are you guys following?

subtitles.original: 結構コメント欄解けてますね！というわけで...
subtitles.english: The comments section is already solving it! So...

subtitles.original: K-E-M-O-N-Oだから、KEMONO（ケモノ）！やったー！
subtitles.english: K-E-M-O-N-O, so KEMONO! Yay!

subtitles.original: 来音くんが優しくね、周期表なんて用意してくれてたけど、助手くんたちはもうすぐ分かっちゃいますよ。
subtitles.english: Rain-kun was kind enough to prepare a periodic table, but my Assistants figure it out instantly.

subtitles.original: こよりも...ま、こより分かってましたけどね！モリブデンMO、分かってましたけどね！
subtitles.english: I also... well, I knew it already! I knew Molybdenum was MO!

subtitles.original: それでは３問目ください！
subtitles.english: Now, the third question, please!

subtitles.original: これあり...何なに？タバタバ？タバタバじゃなかった...タバタタ？天才ありがと！
subtitles.english: What is this? Taba-taba? No... Taba-tata? Thanks, you genius!

subtitles.original: タバタタって何？声に出して言いたくなくなる日本語、タバタタ。え？
subtitles.english: What's Taba-tata? It's one of those Japanese words you don't want to say out loud. Huh?

subtitles.original: で、試験管に入ってるね。紫、オレンジ、グリーン、赤。緑、赤みたいな。
subtitles.english: And it's in test tubes. Purple, orange, green, red. Like green and red.

subtitles.original: 手錠はあるよ！手錠いま繋がってるからね。ガシャガシャガシャ。音聞こえる？
subtitles.english: I have handcuffs! They're on right now. *Clink clink clink*. Can you hear the sound?

subtitles.original: え、これ何みんな分かる？タバタタ...日本の東京にある田端なわけじゃない...
subtitles.english: Wait, do you guys get this? Taba-tata... It's not like the Tabata in Tokyo...

subtitles.original: 分からない間、ちょっとセクシーなポーズをして...手錠映るようにしてもらえるといいんじゃないですかね？助手君捉えないで！
subtitles.english: While I think, I'll strike a sexy pose... It's good if the handcuffs are in the shot, right? Don't catch me, Assistant!

subtitles.original: あっ！みんなちょっと待って、天才じゃん！「飛び立て」。これもう答え言っちゃった！
subtitles.english: Ah! Wait a second, you guys are geniuses! 'Tobitate'. I just said the answer!

subtitles.original: みんなが解くの早すぎてそのまま答え読んじゃったよ！分かった！解き方分かった！
subtitles.english: You solved it so fast that I just read the answer out loud! I get it! I see how it works now!

subtitles.original: えっと、これはタ行、バ行、タ行、タ行ってことで...
subtitles.english: So, this is the Ta-column, Ba-column, Ta-column, and Ta-column...

subtitles.original: で、その「あいうえお」って５個あるから、タの５個目...
subtitles.english: And since there are five vowels (a, i, u, e, o), the 5th in the 'Ta' column...

subtitles.original: ５個目までしか入ってないからね、液体がね。から、タ行の５個目「ト」！
subtitles.english: The liquid only goes up to the 5th level. So, the 5th in the 'Ta' column is 'To'!

subtitles.original: で、バ行の、これ上から２個目だね「ビ」！
subtitles.english: And for the 'Ba' column, this is the 2nd one from the top, so 'Bi'!

subtitles.original: で、タ行の１番下「タ」！で、タ行の下から２番目「テ」！
subtitles.english: Then the 1st level in the 'Ta' column is 'Ta'! And the 4th level in the 'Ta' column is 'Te'!

subtitles.original: 「飛び立て」だ！すごいすごいすごい！助手くんごめん、こより解かなかった...
subtitles.english: It's 'Tobitate'! Amazing! Sorry Assistants, I didn't solve it myself...

subtitles.original: 助手くんがさ、答え書いてくれてたから、分かっちゃった。やったー！え、３問解けました？
subtitles.english: I saw the answer you wrote and figured it out. Yay! Did we solve all three?

subtitles.original: 解けた？ピポピポ？やったー！というわけで...
subtitles.english: Did we? *Beep beep*! Yay! And so...

subtitles.original: お題に該当する歌声を届けよってことだから...
subtitles.english: It says to deliver the singing voices that match the themes...

subtitles.original: ギターを使う曲、ケモノになる曲、飛び立つ曲を歌えばいいっていいことですね！
subtitles.english: So I should sing a song that uses a guitar, a song about being a beast, and a song about taking flight!

subtitles.original: やったー！みんなありがと！助手くんさすがこよりの助手くん、助けてくれますね！
subtitles.english: Yay! Thank you everyone! My Assistants are the best, you really helped me out!

subtitles.original: え、じゃあもうこの３曲歌えば試練クリアできるってこと？なんか試練をクリアしたらなんと...
subtitles.english: So if I sing these three songs, I'll clear the trial? And apparently, once I clear them...

subtitles.original: あれをお披露目できるみたいですよ、助手くん！じゃあ...
subtitles.english: I'll be able to reveal 'that', Assistants! Now...

subtitles.original: あ！待って！手錠も外れた！外れたよ！
subtitles.english: Ah! Wait! The handcuffs came off too! They're off!

subtitles.original: もうちょっと手錠遊びたかったんだけどな。ちょっと時間あるからちょっと付けてください。
subtitles.english: I wanted to play with the handcuffs a bit more. Since we have time, please put them back on.

subtitles.original: 付けられます？いつの間にか取られちゃったからさ。みんな手錠って...
subtitles.english: Can you? They were taken off before I knew it. Everyone, handcuffs are...

subtitles.original: ここもっと時間かかったらヤバかったんですけど、本来よりも時間が...
subtitles.english: It would've been bad if this took more time, but we're ahead of schedule...
